Oasis Albums

Dig Out Your Soul (2008)

Album Statistics

  • Release Date: October 6, 2008
  • UK Chart Position: #1
  • First Week Sales: 200,000 copies
  • Total Sales: Over 5 million copies worldwide
  • Certification: Platinum (UK)

Key Tracks

  • The Shock of the Lightning
  • I'm Outta Time
  • Falling Down
  • To Be Where There's Life

Final Album

The band's seventh and final studio album before their split in 2009. Recorded at Abbey Road Studios and mixed at The Village Recorder in Los Angeles.

Album Production Details

Producers

  • Owen Morris (1994-1997)
  • Mark "Spike" Stent (2000)
  • Dave Sardy (2005-2008)

Recording Studios

  • Rockfield Studios, Wales
  • Abbey Road Studios, London
  • Wheeler End Studios, Buckinghamshire
  • The Village Recorder, Los Angeles
